pageTitle: The Yard Limit - ATSF SSB1200 (Switcher, San Bernardino)
textBeforeTable: Data When retired in 1984-1985 18 units went to Amtrak as #550-567. A total of 29 were rebuilt from NW2, SW9, SW1200 and TR4 A&B units. ATSF SSB1200 Rebuild at the San Bernardino shops, hence SSB for Switcher, San Bernardino.
textAfterTable: Example Photo Credit: Bill Weibel Railfan.net ABPR Image Archives Link - posted to alt.binaries.pictures.rail NW2 1215 number model built/rebuilt history 2365 NW2 Sep39 EMC bn 927, renumbered as 2415 1215 SSB 28May76 to AMTK 550 1216 number model built/rebuilt history 2366 NW2 Mar43 EMC bn 1769, renumbered as 2416, 1416 1216 SSB 29Dec78 to AMTK 551 1217 number model built/rebuilt history 2355 NW2 Aug39 EMC bn 917, renumbered as 2405 1217 SSB 31Jan75 to AMTK 552 SW9 1220 number model built/rebuilt history 2420 SW9 May53 EMD bn 18086, renumbered as 1420 1220 SSB 23Feb78 to AMTK 553 1221 number model built/rebuilt history 2421 SW9 May53 EMD bn 18087, renumbered as 1421 1221 SSB 23Feb79 to AMTK 554 1222 number model built/rebuilt history 2422 SW9 May53 EMD bn 18088
